comment.body: @nofish: Your repo ZeroNet On  GitCenter, Is exceeded the 20mb But The Problem : gitcenter each repos redirect to main site, so cannot click the button in notification for to up 20mb :/ i try to modify sites.json no success :(

> [nofish](#comment_246_1J3rJ8ecnwH2EPYa6MrgZttBNc61ACFiCj): Yeah I'm aware the problem (Currently it's 8.5MB, so it did not passed 10MB limit yet), I will add the possibility to ZeroHello to increase the site limit without opening the site.Until then you can do it here: http://127.0.0.1:43110/1P4w4Rvh4vS9r6G5xTiSh8qEW87EKZtnJB/admin.html

thank you!
